name: custom-select
description: A lightweight JavaScript library for custom HTML <select> creation and managing. No dependencies needed.

scripts.clean: rimraf build && mkdir build && rimraf examples/build && mkdir examples/build && cpx src/css/custom-select.css build/
scripts.test: cross-env NODE_PATH=src browserify -t babelify src/test/index.js | tape-run
scripts.build: babel src/index.js -s -o build/index.js && browserify src/global.js -o build/custom-select.min.js -t [ babelify ] -p [minifyify --no-map] && browserify src/jquery-adaptor.js -o build/jquery.custom-select.min.js -t [ babelify ] -p [minifyify --no-map]
